name: m365-manage-pending-emails-conversations-prompt
title: List emails and Teams conversations needing attention and not yet replied
shortDescription: Ask Copilot to list the emails and Teams conversations needing attention and not yet replied
longDescription: This prompt will ask Copilot to systematically track and manage pending communications, ensuring no important messages are overlooked. A detailed list of emails and Teams conversations that need the user's action. Each item includes essential details such as the sender, subject, date, importance, and mention.

thumbnails.alt: Prompt for Copilot for Microsoft 365 to track and manage pending communications
